dpmCompetition
Class Driver

java.lang.Object
  dpmCompetition.Driver

public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object

Provides robot the capabilities of traveling to different destinations

Remove the offset cause by the distance between the sensors and the wheels.

Parameters:

offset - the horizontal distance between the sensors and the wheels
Returns:
